p:
Two regimes were used to deplete neutrophils in mice, as indicated in figure legends. Mice were either given 200 µg i.n. and 500 µg i.p. α-Ly6G MAb or isotype rat Ig2A MAb (Bio X Cell) one day pre-infection or mice were given 150 µg i.p. one day pre-infection and then every other day throughout the infection as indicated in the figure legends
20, 22, 32 . The isotype control was always given the same route, dose and frequency as the α-Ly6G Mab.
